skill.name: Building Lollms Apps
skill.description: Guide for creating FastAPI + Tailwind apps compliant with Lollms discovery and VS Coder features.
skill.content:
# üöÄ Building Lollms-Compliant Apps Lollms-compliant apps use a FastAPI backend, a TailwindCSS frontend, and a `description.yaml` for discovery. --- ## 1Ô∏è‚É£ Project Structure ```text my_app/ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ backend/ ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ models/ # Pydantic models (Security: Input Validation) ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ routes/ # API endpoints (Modularity: APIRouter) ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ utils.py # Logic helpers ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ frontend/ ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ static/ # CSS, JS, icon.png ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ templates/ # Jinja2 HTML ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ description.yaml # Discovery metadata ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ server.py # CLI entry point ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ .env # Secrets (Security: Environment Variables) ``` --- ## 2Ô∏è‚É£ Metadata & Discovery Create `description.yaml` at the root. Lollms scans this to list your app in the library. ```yaml name: My Lollms App author: Developer version: '1.0' category: AI Tools description: "A secure, modern AI-powered tool." creation_date: '2025-02-13' last_update_date: '2025-02-13' ``` ### ‚ú® Generate App Icon Use the VS Coder built-in tag to generate your identity directly in the chat: --- ## 3Ô∏è‚É£ Backend (FastAPI) ### üîí Security & Practices 1. **Input Validation**: Use Pydantic models for all API requests to prevent injection and schema errors. 2. **Environment Variables**: Use `python-dotenv`. Never hardcode API keys or database strings. 3. **CORS**: Always use `CORSMiddleware`. In production, restrict `allow_origins` to your specific domain. 4. **Async First**: Use `async def` for I/O bound tasks (API calls, DB queries) to keep the server responsive. **`server.py` Boilerplate:** ```python import argparse, uvicorn from fastapi import FastAPI, Request from fastapi.staticfiles import StaticFiles from fastapi.templating import Jinja2Templates from fastapi.middleware.cors import CORSMiddleware app = FastAPI(title="Lollms App") app.add_middleware(CORSMiddleware, allow_origins=["*"]) # Tighten for production! app.mount("/static", StaticFiles(directory="frontend/static"), name="static") templates = Jinja2Templates(directory="frontend/templates") @app.get("/") async def root(request: Request): return templates.TemplateResponse("index.html", {"request": request}) def main(): parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description="Lollms App Server") parser.add_argument("--port", type=int, default=8000, help="Port to run on") args = parser.parse_args() uvicorn.run("server:app", host="0.0.0.0", port=args.port, reload=True) if __name__ == "__main__": main() ``` --- ## 4Ô∏è‚É£ Frontend (Tailwind) Use the Tailwind CDN for rapid development in `frontend/templates/index.html`. ```html Lollms App

Lollms App Interface

Built with FastAPI + Tailwind

``` --- ## üí° Pro Tips - **Statelessness**: Prefer stateless backends. Store state in a database (like SQLite) rather than global variables for reliability.
